name: @thi.ng/binary
description: Assorted binary / bitwise operations, conversions, utilities.
author: Karsten Schmidt <k+npm@thi.ng>

scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn build:es6 && yarn build:parcel && yarn build:parcel:min
scripts.build:parcel:min: parcel build --global thing_binary -o index.min.js -d lib --experimental-scope-hoisting src/index.ts
scripts.build:parcel: parcel build --global thing_binary -d lib --no-minify --experimental-scope-hoisting src/index.ts && prettier --write lib/index.js
scripts.test: rimraf build && parcel build -d build --no-cache --no-minify --no-source-maps test/index.ts && nyc mocha build/index.js
